1111.content: Why must Konata wear diapers?
1111.title: Konata Izumi

11111.content:
One morning, Konata woke up to find that her bed was wet.
"Not again," she said to herself.
It was the third morning in a row that she wet herself in her sleep. Konata was now worried that the accidents won't stop anytime soon and something must be done. But first she needs to wash her sheets and clothes. Is someone else in her house?
11111.title: She wets the bed

choices: "It'll be fine for your family to know."
11122.content:
"K..konata.. can I stop now, please?" Kagami pleaded with her girlfriend, her face bright red as she sat on Konata's lap wearing a bunnysuit.
"Aw, but I have so many more cosplay and task for you~" Konata whined, setting another manga on top of the pile to her left, the one on her right still larger.

Konata was sniffing around in Kagami's room while she was away, trying to find some dirt on her. Luckily, she found her stash of manga, visual novels, and anime. Now she was bribing Kagami, a task or cosplay per manga or else she would be exposed as an otaku.

"Hmm..." Konata embraced the bunny on her lap, glancing at her little bag of tricks causing the gears in her head to turn. There was something she had wanted Kagami to do for awhile, and one manga wouldn't be enough.

"Here's another~" She smiled, switching one manga from the right stack to the other, pulling a pink collar out of her bag with a large bell on it, fastening it around Kagami's neck.
"W..what's this for, are you gonna make me wear nekomimi next?" She asked with a gulp, tugging on the collar.
"Nope. I'll only make you do two more things if you agree, for the rest of the manga. Don't worry, you won't be exposed." Konata smiled, hugging her tighter as she thought about it, toying with her hair."

"W..Will you tell me what it is..?"

"Nope!"

Kagami whimpered, scared by the cheshire grin spread across her otaku girlfriend's face.

"A...alright I guess.." She muttered nervously. Konata grinned triumphantly, getting up and stripping Kagami of her outfit.

"You can't fight me on this, ok?" Kagami nodded meekly, covering herself up as konata shuffled through the contents of her bag. Her eyes widened as konata pulled a diaper and changing supplies out of her bag.

"D..do you want me to diaper you and treat you like a baby?" She asked hopefully as Konata picked her up and placed her on her bed, Konata was closer to a baby than her after all.

"N~ope!" Konata said, forcing kagami to spread her legs so sh could slide the opened disposable diaper under her bottom. She proceeded to powder and oil Kagami's diaper area before finally folding up and taping the thick white disposable diaper between her legs, kagami to embarrassed to open her mouth.

"Now then, you'll do anything reasonable that I say, and you won't take off your diapers if you don't want people to know about you being an otaku.. or in diapers." Konata explained, picking up Kagami and hugging her tightly. " You look so cute!"

"A..alright...I guess it's not that bad.." Kagami muttered shyly, hugging konata back shyly.

The two cuddled with each other for awhile before the door opened downstairs, Tsukasa's voice announcing from down the stairs that they were back.

"C..crap!" Kagami got up, remembering her current state and getting off the bed.

"Not so fast!" Konata chimed in, grabbing Kagami's hand firmly.
11122.title: Someone wants her to wear.

111221.content:
"Your family should already know about all these manga, so they should know about your wetting to." Konata explained, forcing Kagami onto her lap.

"W-what are you talking about wetti-" Kagami was shut up by a rubber object entering her mouth, automatically sucking on the pacifier.

"Well, you obviously had a wetting problem, so you came to Konata-sama and got her to diaper you like the little girl you are!" She explained, teasing her and threatening to spank her as she kept struggling. They both paused as kagami's door opening, one of her big sisters there.

"Hey kagami, I-" She stopped, taking in the sight of her mature little sister dressed as a baby and about get spanked, and began to bust out laughing.
111221.title: "It'll be fine for your family to know....

111222.content:
"I'll handle dressiing you!" Konata said, making her padded girlfriend sit down on the bed as she got her bag, noticing kagami pouting. "Remember, you agreed to this~"

" N..not this specifically.." She muttered, gulping as Konata pulled out what was either a magical girl's outfit, or a baby dress. It was a baby yellow dress with poofy sleeves and plenty of white frills all over it. The skirt stopped at the upper thigh, and it came with a handful of accessories.

"Y..you really expect me to wear that?" She asked in shock, getting caught as she tried to crawl away.

"It will hide your diaper." Konata said simply, avoiding the bigger problem as she forced Kagami into the dress. "Don't think I won't hesitate to spank you~" Konata threatened as she tied matching ribbons into her hair before placing her on a cushion with a game controller in her hand, sitting down next to her to make it look like they were playing the game on the TV.

"You d-don't know that I wouldn't like that." Kagami said a little mischievously, biting her lip as her sister opened the door, blushing dark red.

"Onee-chan, i bought so-" Tsukasa paused as she noticed the dolled up older sister in front of her. It almost looked like her brain broke from trying to analyze this situation. "D..did onee-chan want to be younger..?" She asked in confusion.

Konata chuckled, pulling the flustered big baby onto her lap. "She lost a bet against me Tsukasa, so I made her cosplay as a magical girl." Konata said, teasing the embarrassed teen on her lap.

"O..oh I see!" Tsukasa lit up, sitting down next to them when she noticed the game on the screen, one she was playing recently.

"K..konata, I have to pee.." Kagami whispered into her ear, trying to keep Tsukasa from noticing.

Konata grinned, whispering back. "Then just-
111222.title: "I'll handle dressing you."

1112222.content:
"Use your diaper silly, no more potty for you~" Konata said, taking the controller from kagami and trapping her in her embrace.

"F...fine.." Kagami muttered with a pout, instead deciding to try to hold herself until Tsukasa decided to leave. The pressure in her bladder was already worse than she suspected though, growing worse as Konata began squeezing her girlfriend. Kagami quickly foundherself giving up, a small hissing noise going on as the thirsty padding around her waist sucked up her urine, her face relieved and red as a lobster as she attracted the attention of everyone in the room.

"What's that noise?" Tsukasa asked curiously, redirecting her attention from the screen to her sister.

Kagami gulped, opening her mouth to make some excuse before Konata opened her big fat mouth.

"Kagamin's just we-" Before konata could finish her sentence she found herself writhing on the ground in pain, a big lump on her head caused by Kagami's smoking fist.

"I-it's probably a leak Tsukasa, I'll just go ch-" Kagami froze as her twin lifted her skirt, poking the wet padding curiously.

"Onee-chan's having accidents?" Tsukasa asked curiously, konata recovering from her pain as she sat up with a triumphant smile.

"Yup! Kagamin was wetting herself like a little girl so she came to Konata-sama and asked her to diaper her!" Kagami glared at her girlfriend as Tsukasa put her fist in her open palm, suddenly understanding everything.

"Don't worry onee-chan, I'll take care of you as the big sis now." Tsukasa said smoothingly as she gently pushed her confused sister down on her back, un-taping the diaper and asking Konata were the rest were as Kagami layed there exposed and flustered.

"We have to go buy more." Konata said, pouting as she handed Tsukasa the diaper and changing supplies.

"Alright, she can't go out dressed like this though, can she?" She asked in worry, her maternal side taking over as she cleaned up Kagami and got her fitted in her new diaper snuggly.

"Hm... I guess you're right.." Konata muttered, looking Kagami up and down.
1112222.title: Use your diaper silly."

11122222.content:
Tsukasa decided to change Kagami's much to her sister's embarrassment.

"Please, don't do this," Kagami pouted.

"You have to if you don't want your little secret to be found out," Konata threatened.

Knowing that her reputation is on the line, Kagami agreed as her sister removed the magical girl's outfit, leaving her in just a diaper. Kagami blushed as Tsukasa searched the drawer for something for Kagami to wear.

"How about this?" Tsukasa asked, holding out a pink shirt with Hello Kitty's face on it.

"Perfect," Konata said.

"Arms up," Tsukasa ordered her sister.

Kagami complied and lifted her arms in the air as her sister slid the shirt onto her older sister.

"And now to cover up that diaper," Konata said as she handed Tsukasa a skirt.

Tsukasa placed the skirt around her sister's diaper, but it barely long enough to hide her diaper. The only way Kagami could hide her padded rear was if she stood upright and didn't bend over.

"You did a good job," Konata told Tsukasa.

"Now we can get more," Tsukasa said.

"And now for out method of travel," said Konata.
11122222.title: Tsukasa changes her.

111222221.content:
"C-can't we just walk to the local convenience store?" Kagami asked somewhat angrily as she was lead onto the train. Konata was holding one of her hands, and her sister was holding her other, making her keep up or she'd risk exposing her padded rear.

"They only sell baby diapers there kagami. We're going to a specialty store in Harajuku." Tsukasa explained, sitting down next to Konata on the train.

"I can understand you Tsukasa, but why do you know about this store Konata..?" Kagami asked, blushing bright red as she was pulled onto konata's lap due to the lack of seating.

"Details. And she's your onee-chan now, kagamin, try calling her by such." Konata re-directed the topic.

"I-i ca-" Kagami paused as she saw the anxious look on her sister's face, and noticed that Konata was starting to lift the back of her skirt.

"O..onee-chan.." She muttered quietly, tugging on the back of her skirt and blushing dark red as she noticed Tsukasa's beaming face, along with the phone with it's camera turned on and facing her.

"S..so this is it..?" Kagami asked with a gulp, looking at the store in front of there little group.

It didn't stand out from the other fashion bussinesses in Harajuku, but there were pictures of models dressed like babies displayed in the windows.

"Yup." Tsukasa smiled, pulling her older sister into the store.

On the inside it looked more like a nursery than a store, daycare-like areas on the sides and pink shelves lining the aisles. Kagami was suprised to see some girls from their grade in the store and the daycare area, looking like the models in the window.

"Hello there miss." A store employee that couldn't be any older than them stepped up to them. "Would you like to drop off the little one as you shop?" She asked, looking at Tsukasa rather than Kagami.

"A-ah, it's not me." Tsukasa clarified, blushing and pointing at her twintailed sister, konata lifting up her skirt to show her diaper.

"Oh, I'm sorry. Would you like to leave her in the daycare then?"
111222221.title: They take the subway.

1112222212.content:
"Nope, we want to keep our eyes on her." Konata said, hugging the flustered big baby.

"Is that so? Just come to me if you change your mind." She said calmly, smiling and walking off to handle a customer in the daycare.

"Th..thanks for not making me have to be a baby.." Kagami said with a sigh, tugging on her skirt.

"Hm? Who said that?" Konata said, grinning and going first and foremost to the diaper aisle.

" Do we have enough?" Tsukasa asked, pushing a grocery cart filled with diapers, Adult baby apparel, pacifiers and bottles, etc. Kagami was shoved into the baby seat, doing her best to hide her padded status.

"I think so. Kagamin should be set up for the next month or so." She said, smiling and teasing kagami as they went up to the cash register.

"Tsukasa, can you hold these for a sec?" Konata asked as they exited the store, handing Tsukasa the bags and turning to Kagami, who looked at her curiously. Konata bent down, lifting her skirt and poking the padding between her legs, then cringing. Fortunately, the fist she was expecting never came as kagami pulled her skirt between her legs.

"She's dry~" Konata announced, earning a slap as kagami recovered.

"Good. Can we dress her up in some of this stuff we bought?" Tsukasa asked, clearly excited as she pulled kagami towards a bathroom.
1112222212.title: No.

11122222121.content:
"H..hold on, I'm not doing anymore of this baby stuff in public!" Kagami fussed, pulling away.

Tsukasa sighed, looking at her sister in dissapointment. She sat down on a bench and pulled kagami over her lap, kagami's face dark red as her skirt was raised. "I don't want to do this Kagami.." Tsukasa said, lowering her diaper and giving her a hard slap on her bottom. Her little sisters spankings were much stronger than expected,making her yelp and jump a little. She only did it 5 more times before pulling Kagami up on her lap, her bottom covered once again.

"Will you listen to your onee-chan now?" She asked. Kagami sniffled and nodded, her face dark red due to all the eyes now fixed on them, and her bottom.

"Good girl~" Konata teased her, patting her head, having recorded the whole thing.

"Since you were naughty you're getting dressed here though."Tsukasa said, laying her on the bench and going through bags with konata.

"Now what will you wear..?"

"Done!" Tsukasa squeeled, grinning at the flustered girl in front of her. They managed to dress kagami up without to many people noticing, since events like this probably transpired here often.

First and foremost, they shoved the flustered girl into a white onesie with pink animals on them, with short sleeves and pink trim on them. Due to Kagami's whining, they added on a short white skirt with pink trim on it that was as efficient at hiding her diaper as her previous outfit. In addition a bonnet with white cat ears was placed on her head, a white tail was attached to her diaper and coming out under her skirt, and she had a pacifier in her mouth.

"D..dis is widicuwous.." Kagami muttered, getting pulled onto her feet by konata and into an embrace.

"Come on kagamin~, just relax, you're adorable!" Konata cooed, kagami not fighting. Kagami didn't fight for the rest of the way back.

During their time at the store the girls were able to find a highchair Kagami's size and placed her in it. Konata locked the tray into place and brought out a jar of strain peas."

"Please let me out," Kagami begged.

Konata ignored her friend and placed the spoon into a jar and proceeded to feed Kagami the strained peas.

"Open wide for the choo-choo," Konata said.

Kagami tried to resist by avoiding the spoon. Eventually Konata was able to get the spoon in her mouth and forced it in there until she swallowed the contents inside. Konata proceeded to keep on feeding Kagami until the jar was empty.

"You were such a good girl, finishing your food," Konata praised.

She looked at Kagami who didn't seem to happy about her ordeal.

"I think someone needs her nap," Tsukasa said.

The girls brought Kagami back into her room. They didn't have enough money to buy her a crib her size so they tucked her into her bed.

"Remember, if you think about leaving then I'll tell all everyone that your an otaku," Konata threatened.

The girls turned off the light and left Kagami to sleep, which she did after all she went through so far today. A few hours later, however, Kagami woke up as she felt a cramp in her abdomen.

"This can't be happening," Kagami said.

She knew that she had to poop, but didn't want to do it in her diaper.

" K-konata!" Kagami cried, keeping her voice down in hopes of the rest of her family not hearing her. She had to sit there for a couple minutes, taking note of the new baby monitor in her room, before some light peaked through the door.

"What is it, kagami?" Tsukasa asked, clad in her pj's and going to pick up her older sister.

"I..I..n.."Kagami clenched her clothes, groaning as she couldn't hold anymore, a warm stinky mess filling the seat of her diaper.

"Aw, it's okay kagamin, Iknow you can't help it. Onee-chan will take care of it!" Tsukasa said soothingly, bouncing her in her arms and rubbing her back.

111222221211222.title: The next day is a school day.

Konata dismissed the thought, laying Kagami back on her bed and lifting her skirt.

1141.title: Akiyama Mio

11411.content:
Mio Akiyama moved rather slowly and carefully compared to her usual gate as she snuck her way into the school gates. She was much later than she usually was for school, always arriving early with her friends,but today she had a good reason for sitting down in her seat right when the school bell ring,that 'reason' crinkling under her skirt as she sat down,her cheeks already adorned with red as she set down her bag on the side of her desk nervously.

"Yo,Mio!"Ritsu greeted all to familairly,turning to the visibly-nervous raven haired girl,although she was the only one that noticed. After all,after being someone's friend for years you should be able to pick up on these things right? "Something up?"

She reacted nervously,turning to her and trying to think of what to say. Should she tell her or not? She opened her mouth,but much to her relief the bell rang right at that moment and sawako-sensei came in,setting her things on her desk.

She sighed in relief and shook her head a little,causing ritsu to frown and turn away.

'Today's going to be a long day..' Mio thought,tugging on her skirt with her right hand nervously as her left began to scribble down notes.

Luckily for Mio,all of her friends migrated around her desk for lunch,and there was no gym period today. So besides the trek to the clubroom she wouldn't really have to leave her desk,but of course,that was the part that she was most worried about. On the way to the lightmusic club-room there were three flights of stairs,and she was certain that at least one of her friends would tag along with her.

She was musing over the plans in her head as she chatted with Ritsu and Yui on the way to the clubroom,but then her number one worry showed up to greet them before she had a good plan. She looked at the stairs worryingly as Yui started bounding up them,wondering verbally about what sweets mugi had brought to the clubroom today.

It was already a miracle that they hadn't noticed the light crinkling sound that was coming from her baby-ish undergarment,she was certain that she wouldn't be able to keep ritsu from seeing them.

'Well,I might as well try..'

She tugged on the back of her short school-regulation skirt,doing the best to cover it up without being do obvious. Her legs were visibly shaking,and her cheeks were flushed with a rosy pink blush.

Of course,ritsu who was a short distance below and behind her noticed this odd behavior right away and grabbed her friend's hand and her skirt,taking a quick peek at the thick,white poofy diaper underneath Mio's skirt before dropping her skirt and covering Mio's mouth with her hand to suppress the surprised yelp that she knew would come.

She made sure that Yui wasn't paying attention to them for the time being as she leaned up close to the other girls ear.

The oblivious guitarist was still trailing on about sweets and tea,and she had picked up pace,anxious to get to the clubroom as quickly as possible. Relieved to see this,Ritsu began to whisper-

"Mio,why are you wearing a diaper? Let's...make a stop before we go to the club,so you can tell me what's up."

The raven-haired girls face turned dark red as she learned she was found out and she just nodded shyly, still keeping up her attempts to minimize the obvious-ness of the thick undergarment.

"Yui,me and Mio have to do something but we'll come to the clubroom in a little bit,ok?"Ritsu called ahead as she emerged from the top of the second flight of stairs with a blushing maiden in tow.

"Hai,Ric-chan~" Yui called back from somewhere above. Ritsu grinned and sped off with her hand firmly grasped around Mio's wrist.

The drummer pulled her reluctant friend into a classroom,fairly sure that noone would come in since classes were over for the day. She straightened the black haired girl up and stared into her eyes.

"Alright Mio,tell me what's going on!"Ritsu insisted,a little to loudly in Mio's opinion.

"W-well...as I'm sure you remember my mom is a b-bit strict...a-and last night I had an accident while I was sleeping...a-a-and mommy's policy for that is that first I have to wear a d...d-diaper for several days and keep it dry. I-if I don't keep it dry...she has a-another policy for that.." She answered,her face a dark red and tears brimming at her eyes.

'Oh,I see...she still call's her mommy?' Ritsu thought with a snicker,embracing the only slightly larger girl warmly,stealthily lifting up her skirt enough to take a curious peek at the diaper again.

"I understand,but if you aren't so nervous about it people won't notice so easily,right?"She teased her,patting her bottom just to spite her. She had a confident feeling that she wouldn't get hit today.

She was wrong,but she wasn't hit on the head nearly as hard as usual.

"W-w-well now you've made things worse! I was perfectly dry until you scared me by lifting my skirt earlier!"She screamed at her,tears starting to roll down her cheeks.

"O-o-oh...sorry..."Ritsu responded akwardly,rubbing the back of her head nervously."Do you have extras or something?"

"W-w-well yeah...I have a couple extras...but I don't know how to change one..."She mumbled the last part under her breath and rather quickly. Ritsu heard her,but she decided it was worth teasing her about it.

"What? I couldn't hear you~"She said,a cheeky grin flashing across her features.

"I s-said that I can't change my own diaper!"Mio nearly-screamed,her face red with both frustration and embarasement.

'hehe,that's the cute expression that I was going for~' Ritsu thought,smiling and pushing two desk next to each other.

"Well lucky for you,I know how to. Just lay down and give me the new diaper and I'll fix you right up!" She said,her grin still present.

"A-are you nuts! I'm not letting you change me!"Mio actually screamed this time,tugging on her skirt and backing up.

"Hush Mio hush! Someone will hear you and investigate."Mio nodded,but kept tugging on her skirt and glaring daggers at ritsu,who could tell that she was in hot water right now.

"Now then,would you rather face what your mother has planned for you or have me change you so you can get out of diapers faster?"

Mio thought it over for a moment,tears rolling down her cheeks as she went over both options in her head. She sighed and,ever so reluctantly,let go of her death-grip on her skirt,handed her bag to ritsu,and layed down on the desk,which she was just barely able to stay on. "J-just make it quick,there's baby powder and wipes in there..."She grumbled,closing her eyes and quietly sobbing to herself.

Ritsu sighed and took out a new diaper as well as the supplies. "It's alright Mio,we all have accidents sometimes,just calm down and don't think about it." She said,deciding that it was time to stop teasing her as she leaned over her,removing her skirt.

The brunette blushed at the sight of the yellowed-diaper belonging to the mature-teenager in front of her. She just tried to block it out of her head as she removed the tapes on the side of her diaper,slowly removing the wet diaper. She quickly disposed of the wet diaper,opened up the new diaper and slid it under mio's bottom,then wiped her clean as carefully as she could,much to Mio's obvious discomfort."S-sorry..."

Then she took out the powder and opened it up,shaking the sweet-smelling powder all over the other girls private and bum. She smiled as she finally took the front of the diaper,raising it between her legs and attaching the tapes."There,all better." She looked over her handiwork and gave Mio a quick pat on her padded bottom,a puff of powder coming out.

The raven-haired girl looked up at her with red eyes and fresh tears still streaming down her cheeks."Th-thank you.."She muttered un-happily,getting up and standing there nervously as Ritsu picked up her skirt and bent down,putting it back on her.

"You know Mio,you honestly look pretty cute in a diaper.."Ritsu said,her complexion matching Mio's lobster-like cheeks. In return for her friends comment,Mio gave her a good knock on the noggin. She gathered up her things and started heading for the door as Ritsu recovered,rubbing the cartoonish bump on her head."Itai~you're so mean Mio-chan~"

"T-tell them I'm not coming to the club today,I'm heading home as soon as I can,make sure that Mugi-chan takes care of elizabeth!"She said,sliding the door open and quickly rushing out without awaiting a response.

114112.content:
“I'm home..” Mio mutters quietly as she takes off her shoes, tugging on the back of her skirt with her free hand. She sighs as no response comes back, her padded bottom crinkling noisily as she walks into the living room. She sighs once again as she spots her mother in the living room, her cheeks rosy red as she walked over.
“Oh, Mio? I'm sorry, I didn't hear you come in sweety!” The thirty year old woman, looking rather young for her age, got up from the couch and hugged her daughter, making her whimper as she patted her diapered rear. “Did my baby girl stay dry all day?” Mio groans and nods meekly, looking away. Her mother notices this, but doesn't say anything as she pats her head. “Good girl! I made some cookies earlier today, why don't you go get some?” While Mio was reluctant to agree based on all of the sweets she ate at the light music club, she figures that she is in no position to argue so she sets down her bag and makes her way to the kitchen.
As she walks off Mio's mother smiles, picking up her daughter's bag and setting it on the table. She swiftly examined it's contents, laying out two white fluffy squares onto the brown coffee table, the baby powder and oil, and wipes. She had just finished and sat down in her seat when Mio walked in, gulping down her last bite of cookie as she sees what's on the table. “Now, tell me Mio, did you think mommy really wouldn't notice a missing diaper?”
“No mommy..” She mutters sadly, not resisting as her mother got up and pulled off her skirt, letting it fall to her feet. The young woman whimpered as her mother grabbed her hand, leading her into another room.
“I really thought that this would stop once you were twelve, Mio..” Her mother sighed, making Mio freeze up as she grabbed a paddle that she left laying outside of Mio's room. “Oh, don't worry, you already got spanked enough this morning sweety.”Mio only lets out a small sigh, going back to rub her bottom and whimpering as her mother grabs both of her hands. “Now come on. Luckily mommy was able to predict that her baby girl couldn't stay dry, and prepared her punishment while she was at school.” Mio whimpers, her mother having to drag her progressively more as they got closer to Mio's room. Finally she opened the door, showing Mio what she had prepared.
“N-no, mommy, please don't do this!” The raven-haired girl groaned as she laid her eyes upon her room. A changing table was set up against the wall, while her bed was laying there there was now instead a small crib from her childhood set up next to the window. A rocking horse was set up next to her 'old' bed, and a playpen next to the other window. The rest of her room was as it used to be, her dresser sitting against the wall next to her desk, although a bag containing mainly her panties was sitting on the ground. Mio groaned and desperately tried to pull away as her mother dragged her into the room, gasping as she was tossed onto the bed with her bottom in the air and received a hard smack from the paddle to her padded rear, permeating through the diaper and reddening her cheeks.
“If you're going to act like a little girl who isn't even potty trained, then I'll treat you like a little girl who isn't potty trained!”Miss Akiyama gave Mio another hard slap with the paddle before setting it down on the bed. “Now, on your back.” Mio obeyed, tears welling up in her eyes as she obediently turned over on her back. She whimpered as her mother grabbed her ankles, lifting her rear in the air and patting the paddle against her pink thighs. “Now, does little Mio-tan want to try to tell mommy what to do again?” Mio hastily shook her head no, sniffling as her bottom was set back on the bed and her mother let go of her feet. Much to her discomfort Mio's mother grabbed her by the armpits and sat her up, stripping her down to just her bra and diaper. “Now let mommy explain the new rules while she changes her baby girl.” Mio rubbed at her eyes, groaning as her mother picked her up by the armpits and brought her to the changing table, laying her down on it.
“I'm not wet..”Mio muttered as she saw her mother grab a puffy white square, whimpering and quieting down as her mother shoved a rubber nipple into her mouth.
“Oh, I'm just double diapering you sweety.” The raven haired teen whimpered as her mother once again raised her bum by the ankles, sliding an unfolded diaper under her already crinkly bottom. “Now then, for the rules. “
“First and foremost: You will only be allowed to wear diapers for at least a month. You are not allowed to use the potty until mommy starts potty training you, even at school.” Mio gulped behind her pacifier, her hands getting slapped away as she tried to keep her mother from closing up the second diaper.”In addition, you are not allowed to touch your own diaper!”
“Second: You will continue to go to school as a big girl, however, when you are at home you will be expected to finish all your homework immediately, then mommy will treat you like the baby you are.” Miss Akiyama worked dilligently as she spoke, forcing Mio to spread her legs as she raised the second diaper between her legs and taped it tightly into place, this one much puffier than the last and adorned with baby bottles and teddy bear prints.”When mommy isn't home, you are expected to treat your babysitter the same way that you would treat mommy.”
“B-babysitter!?” Mio yelped in disbelief, getting sat up once again by her mother.
“Yes sweety, you are a baby after all thus you need a babysitter.” Mio opened her mouth to argue but paused, yelping and trying to keep her bra on as her mother wrestled with her to take it off, forfeiting once she got a hard slap to the thigh.
“Baby girls do not need these!” She tossed the bra aside, going to Mio's dresser and looking through it. “Now I don't expect you to be to open to this from the start, which is why mommy has to be harsh. But I'll be easier on you for the first few days.” As Mio's mother spoke Mio tried to get off her changing table, the crinkling giving her away as her mother came back and placed her back on the table. “Arms.” When Mio refused to comply Miss Akiyama sighed, forcing her to raise her arms. “And finally Third: You are expected to listen to everything mommy says and act like you are expected to, or you will be punished.” As she spoke she squeezed Mio into a pink-striped T-shirt, only big enough to cover her chest and not much more. “Do you understand?”
“Y-yes mommy... b-but why do I have to wear these baby clothes!?” Mio asked, tears rolling down her cheeks as her mother squeezed a pair of grey short shorts onto Mio, the waistband of her diaper showing from the top and the pink frills on the leg-holes of her diaper poking through the legs.
“Awwww someone's grumpy. Maybe it's naptime?” Mio's mother cooed as she forced Mio's hands into thick pink mittens, picking her up by the armpits once again and wiping away her tears. “And I'm going easy sweety, these are nowhere near the baby clothes. Ah! Shhh, shhh, calm down..” Mio burst out in tears at the clothes comment, her mother's rocking failing to calm her down. After about three minutes of rocking Mio's mother sighed, walking over to the crib and laying Mio in it, her padded rear pressed against the bars with her legs hanging over the end, the crib much to small for her. “You really do need a nap, it seems. Now, be a good girl and go to sleep.” Mio kept sobbing as her mother gave her a teddy bear and set up a baby monitor, before finally leaving the room, although she left the door open.
The young woman layed in the cramped crib sobbing, pretty quickly spitting out the pacifier. She groaned as she squirmed, only able to stay on her back as she tried to find a more comfortable position, not even daring to try getting out of her cramped quarters. Eventually she finally cried herself to sleep, an eighteen year old laying there fast asleep in her diaper at 4 PM.

You know people are going to start thinking you're calling me over to do things in here on company time with how often you're calling me." She says, Mio's face unable to turn any more red as she removes her panties, getting the baby wipes. The recent college grad is bent over the toilet with her bottom out as her girlfriend gets her cleaned up, the bottom of her pantsuit once again soaked and her crying softly. 1153322222222222211111.content:
Yukari Sendo was getting fed up with the way she was treated around Yokai Academy. Sure, she had plenty of friends, and nobody mocked her for being a witch anymore. If anything, she was grateful for all the compliments she was given for her high intelligence. However, despite being the most intelligent student at the school, she still received many derisive comments about her physique. That was the downside to being four years younger than everybody else in her class.

In particular, she was annoyed by how her own friend Kurumu Kurono mocked her for her barely-developed chest and diminutive stature. It was as if the succubus reveled in treating her like a little kid. Yukari was able to ignore it at first, but after a while, it was really starting to aggravate her. She was determined to find a way to get Kurumu to treat her like an equal.

She sat in her room at the dormitories, pondering over how she could accomplish this. Finally, an idea occurred to her. If she could prove that she was capable of caring for and looking after another individual, maybe Kurumu would respect her.

Basically, she would need a baby to take care of. However, this would be a bit of a problem. There were no babies on campus, as there were no couples or single parents amongst the student body. Some would find that rather surprising, seeing as how the monster academy seemed to have a much more amorous atmosphere than the average human school.

Yukari then started thinking that maybe an adult baby would work. But who would be willing to do it for her? Certainly not Kurumu or Mizore.

Then it came to her. Moka, of course! In her pink-haired form, the vampire was very sweet, compliant, and even a little submissive. Aside from that, Yukari had a bit of a crush on her, and this would be a perfect excuse for her to see Moka with less clothing on.

Yukari quickly left her room and made her way to Moka's room. She knocked loudly on the door and called out "Hello?"

Inside the room, Moka was lounging on her bed, enjoying the day off of class. She was humming softly to herself. Then she heard the knock on the door. At that, her eyes snapped open, and she turned to the door. She thought aloud "Oh my, I wonder who that may be?"

She got off the bed and smiled softly as she opened the door. She came face-to-face with a witch's hat. She looked down to see her petite friend.

"Oh, hello, Yukari," the vampire greeted the witch, beckoning her inside, "What brings you here?"

Yukari happily entered her friend's room. Currently, both girls were dressed in their standard school uniforms. They preferred wearing them, even when they had no class.

12411.content:
In the world of Pokemon, there are two main career paths for hardcore trainers, each with their own rewards. The first is to become a strong trainer and be showered by sponsors, much like athletes in any other field. The other is to obtain a career in the pokemon league somehow, as a gym leader, trainer, elite four, or otherwise. While the former can result in much higher profits and requires less accomplishments than the latter, it's more rare for trainers to receive as many, or as well paying sponsors, and a job in the pokemon league is far more secure and comes with more admiration. The difference between stars and leaders. Many have become obsessed with the limelight in the region of Unova, including our three main characters, Touko, Mei, and Bianca. They're three friends who set out on the course of stardom half a year and three badges ago, but didn't receive any sponsors due to their weak status, until a big fashion group, Platina styles, approached them with a contract. Happily the three accepted, thinking they'd be given the most recent and stylish dresses to wear. However, they were in for a shock when they met their sponsor for the first time.

"W-Wait, we're modelling diapers!?" Mei, the youngest of the group at 18 asked in disbelief, glaring under her visor. She was the shortest but also had the largest bust, brown hair in odd buns that lead into twintails, and a blue and white pokeball shirt with a yellow mini-skirt, her legs in black stockings.
"Oh no no, I'm afraid you mistunderstood." The representative says, smiling innocently, a girl with long blonde hair and a Kalosian accent. The three girls sighed. "Not just diapers, you will be wearing and advertising all of Platina styles clothes and accessories in our upcoming youth set, aimed to girls age one all the way to twenty five!" The girls glare at her in disbelief, the two brunettes blushing lightly. "A-And there's no arguing it! You already signed your contracts! If you back out now you will be fined for breaching the terms of agreement!" All of the girls gulp, looking at each other.
"W..Well they are paying us a lot... and maybe we'll get to model all the stuff for older girls." Touko says, smiling nervously. She's the oldest at 20 and middle height in the group, her brown hair coming out as a ponytail from the back of her cap. Her signature look are jean booty-shorts with large pockets, a white tank top, and a black small sleeveless vest over that.
"And if we back out we'd have to ask our parents to pay the fines... My parents are already upset I have to borrow money as is.." Bianca said, also 20 and the tallest. She's in the middle in breast size though still fairly large, and she doesn't have as set a style as the other girls, though she generally wears a green beret, green glasses, and more conservative green, white, and orange outfits.
"I'm glad you're all in agreement then!" The representative says, smiling warmly. "Now then, you'll all be told what to wear each day from now on, and each of you will be assigned a specific set of incontinence-protection underwear to wear, changing monthly." She says, taking out her phone. "I will text them to you now, then give you today's set of clothes. We have chosen everything according to what will suit each of you best with the goal of variety between the three of you, so everyone will know what we have to offer." She says, the girls gulping as she removes first three sets of clothes, and then three packs of diapers. "You! You're going to be first, come over here please." The representative says, pointing at the blonde trailer, she gulps, stepping up. "Strip, you're changing completely. Don't be ashamed, we're all girls and nobody can see us."

The brunette sighs, going to sit with the other girls at a table near the entrance to the center. She sits with a crinkle, whimpering and putting her hands in her lap, pressing against her crotch.
"So what do we do? The only way we have to get to Castelia is through Route 4, and we'd need to leave today or tomorrow in order to avoid the incoming sandstorm." Bianca says, checking her Pokegear.
"Great, Elesa only accepts battles on the weekend, and that sandstorm will be going on for a solid week or so. How am I going to become a great trainer if I can't fight in gyms because I'm modelling fucking diapers?" Touko groans, sighing as she looks at the empty spots in her badge case longingly. The girls sit in silence for a while before she looks up at Mei hopefully, the girl gulping and squirming a little uncomfortably. "Mei, you got your first two badges from gyms that me and Bianca have never been to, right?" She says, reaching out and holding her hands.
"W..Well yeah, the Virbank gym and the gym in the town I moved to, Aspertia." Mei says, smiling at her awkwardly. "And the biggest filming studios in the region are in Virbank, so I wouldn't be surprised if we'll be told to go there next."
"Well that's perfect! Let's go!" Touko says enthusiastically, gripping Mei's hand tight and pulling her off her seat as she dashes to the door. The other brunette gasp and stumbles behind her.
"Wait!" Touko freezes as Bianca cries out, Mei whimpering as she bumps into Touko. "I um... I think Mei needs to take care of something first." She says, the short girl blushing dark red and nodding meekly.
"Oh I... S-Sorry about that, go right ahead." She says, Mei hurrying off to the bathroom as soon as Touko lets her go. "Oh wait, shoot.. We gotta go to." Touko says, sighing and following her with Bianca in tow. "So we can't let her go normally, huh? We don't want her to break the contract after all." She mutters as she opens the door to the public bathroom, Mei standing there waiting and pressing her hands between her legs.
"H-Hurry up and remove this so I can go!" She cries, squirming. Her two companions looking at each other hesitantly then back at her, shaking their heads no. "W-What!? C-Come on, they'll never no!" The brunette says, teary eyed and hugging Bianca tight in an attempt to appeal to the more motherly woman. Bianca gulps, unable to keep a stern face as she looks down at Mei's distraught face.
"Well... Maybe they... N-No! I'm sorry Mei but you're going to have to use those diapers from now on!" Bianca says, shaking her head and hugging her tight. Mei begins to sob softly, Bianca grabbing her padded bottom and frowning as she feels it get gradually warmer. "M-My, you really had to go.. Are you done?" The brunette nods hesitantly, rubbing her eyes. "Alright, let's get you changed." She says, grabbing her hand and smiling warmly. She gulps as she looks around, the stalls far to small for both of them to fit into so Bianca could change her. "I'm sorry Mei, I'll try to make this quick, really!" The blonde says, holding her hand tight as she leads her to the baby changing station on the wall outside the stalls, helping her onto it.
"Wait, hold that pose!" Touko cries as Mei freezes, her knee on the plastic table, her wet diaper on full display, the pattern on it faded. She looks back in disbelief as there's a flash, her friend having taken a picture with her pokegear. "Sorry, they said that we need a picture for you every day." Touko says a little guiltily, patting her bottom to get her to finish climbing onto the changing table and laying down, where Bianca strapped the straps over her chest. She was slightly to large for it, of course, her legs dangling off the edge. "Why don't we talk as you get changed, it may distract you!" She says, holding Mei's hand comfortingly, blushing and looking away as a lass comes into the bathroom, staring at Mei before going into a stall.
"Are you sure you don't mind going to Virbank with us Mei? You won't get any gym badges out of it after all." Bianca says as she strips off the wet diaper and cleans Mei up, the young woman gasping and gripping Touko's hand as she wipes her down there. "S-Sorry, I haven't done this before!"
"Y-Yeah, it's fine... I need to stick with you two for this after all... and we'll be going to other gyms later." The brunette says, looking away as an Ace trainer walks in, right when she's getting powdered. She tries to get a picture but Touko steps in the way.
"Hey, no pictures until it's done, then you can take all you want!" She says, the trainer glaring. "Here, you can take some of me until she's done." Touko says with a sigh, blushing dark red as she turns around and lifts the back of her skirt, the other girl looking at her in disbelief as she takes some pictures. "Mei, tell me a little about Virbank's gym while she does this." Touko says, struggling to fake a smile for her.
"R-Right um... Well it's just a rock joint... The leader's a poison specialist who plays the bass, she's super cute.. thank you.." She mutters, Bianca finishing her change and helping her off the table once she's finished her change. Mei takes a deep breath and smiles, walking up to the Ace trainer. "Alright, you've got two minutes to take all the pictures with sexy Mei-chan! If you peek under my skirt though, I'll hate you!" She says, giving her puppy eyes. The trainer, and her companions blush lightly, and the trio leave once she's had her fill of pictures and selfies with Mei, headed towards Castelia.
12411111.title: Head towards Castelia city for the shooting/fil...

124111111.content:
"I'm still really sad we didn't even get to see Elesa you know." Touko says, sighing as they walk down the covered Join Avenue, the covered street mostly vacant of structures save for a few vendors on the sides of the enclosed street, the area still under development. Despite it's vacancy though many trainers and workers pass through there every day, due to it's location. "She's so cool." She mutters, pulling out her pokegear to take a look at what news might have happened while they were occupied.

"Well, it's not like we'll never get to see her again, we will be coming back after all. We should negotiate to get out of our contracts sooner if this doesn't work out so we can get back on track." Bianca says, Touko nodding in agreement.

"Get out of our contracts? But they're paying me really well, and my cuteness will spread around the world!" Mei says, smiling at the thought, imagining being invited to events and night shows wearing the latest, adult, fashion.

"Yeah, your cute padded ass." Touko says, grinning and slapping her bottom. She yelps, pouting and blushing dark red, some passing trainers looking back curiously. "We can try to negotiate for better contracts, we'd all be happy if we were in Bianca's situation after all." She says, the blonde looking a little guilty as they step onto route 4, the most developed part of the Unova desert. Having finished construction just earlier this year, there are now towns on each side of the road for most of the way towards Castelia, less like the barren desert it used to be and now a lively suburb the closer to Castelia you get. The builders were very conscious of the ecosystem to, sand dunes and some artificial pokemon habitats strewn throughout the route along with the natural desert past the structures, the pokemon roaming free. A strong breeze rolls through as the girls admire the scene, Mei yelping and pushing down the back of her skirt as her diaper gets shown off to everyone, Touko blushing but letting hers show until the breeze dies down.

"The sandstorm may arrive sooner than they're predicting.. Let's get going." Bianca says, letting out her Munna to walk alongside her, to watch for pokemon and hazards. "We can easily make it before sunset if we hurry." She says, grabbing Touko and Mei's hands and leading them down the road, mostly safe since cars only came through occasionally. They talk for a few hours as they walk down the road, the diapers surprisingly well designed for girls on the move and giving them no problems. They only have to stop occasionally to talk to a few fashion-savy aspiring trainers and beautiful trainers who ask Touko and Bianca about their clothes, since they've never seen them before.

"Nobody's asking me about my clothes.." Mei mutters after taking a sip of water from her water bottle, sighing, only an hour away now from Castelia. "They're so cute to... I'd wear them normally." She whines, putting on a fake smile and waving as people sitting at a cafe giggle at her, blushing lightly.

"Maybe they can sense your whiny nature." Bianca says, putting Mei's pacifier in her mouth. "We can go by an elementary school if you really want, I'm sure they'd love you there!" Mei gulps, shaking her head no and quietly sucking on her binky. Bianca chuckles, taking out her pokegear and blushing lightly as she looks for something.

"Let me guess, you're looking for bathrooms to?" Touko asks, looking over at her screen and holding herself. "The closest one is fifteen minutes away, and I'm about to burst.." The brunette says, biting her lip.

"You can both go right here then!" Mei says, the two girls looking at her in surprise. "Don't you two feel guilty!? You gave me no choice but to wet my diaper while you watched! So it's only fair that you sit over on those benches and do the same!" The buxom girl says, grinning mischievously and grabbing their hands.

"Well... No, you're right, I understand." Bianca says, sighing and letting Mei pull her along peacefully. "But only this once!"

"I-I'd really rather not.." Touko mutters, reluctantly following as she's sat on a bench by the sidewalk next to Bianca. She gasps as Mei suddenly hugs her, looking up at her pleadingly. "F-Fine, I'll do it!" She groans, Mei smiling and backing up to watch. The two girls sigh, holding each other's hands as they try to let it go, jumping a little every time a car passes.

"Hold on, I need a picture of you every day as well Touko! Lift that skirt and don't lower it until your done please? You might as well do it to Bianca, you might get a raise~" The two look at each other nervously, Touko holding herself hard now.

"F-Fine..." Touko mutters, raising her skirt so her diaper is visible in all its glory. Bianca sniffles, blushing crimson as she pulls her pants down to her knees and then sits back down, holding Touko's hand tightly. The two sit there awkwardly for a solid five minutes, Mei beginning to get bored by the time the third person took a picture, before Touko gasps, biting her lip as an obvious wet spot spreads from the crotch of her diaper. She begins to lower her skirt but stops as Mei shakes her head no, glaring at her as she keeps it up. They sit there for another two minutes before Bianca gasps, beginning to sniffle as a much more faint wet spot spreads from the crotch of her diaper, clearly at its limits already by the time she's finished peeing.

"Alright, you can change now." Mei says, grinning like a little kid as she takes the picture. The girls sigh, getting fresh diapers out of their bags and changing into them as quickly as they possibly can, a few people still passing by while they do this and watching in amazement. "See, that wasn't so bad was it?" Mei asks teasingly as the two girls get up and walk back to her, both blushing.

"Sh-Shut up and never mention this again and I'll consider not spanking your padded ass." Touko says, Mei merely smiling and nodding as she hugs Bianca's arm.

"And if you do something like that again, I'll send a picture of her spanking you to your mom afterwards." Bianca says. Mei gulps, nodding and hugging tighter, not letting go until they see the gates to Castelia, the massive towering skyline over them.
124111111.title: Onwards!

1241111111.content:
"Wow... I'll never get over just how huge this city is.." Bianca says, staring up at the towering buildings all around them, Touko holding her hand tight. She whimpered as someone bumped into her, then disapeared right into the crowd without even a word. "And.. Lively." She says, smiling nervously.

"I don't think I'll ever get used to how... crowded it is." Touko says, frowning and sticking close to Bianca. She shivers gently, jumping a little whenever someone bumped her, especially her bottom. "B-Bianca someone touched my bottom! They totally did!" The blonde smiles warmly, rubbing her head.

"Jeez Touko, what happened to being the cool one? You're acting like a Dwebble without its shell!" Mei says, chuckling and coming back with three Castelia cones, the biggest oran berry flavored one for her of course. Touko takes her Rawst berry flavored one, glaring and eating it quickly to distract herself. Mei grins, poking her side and giggling as she jumps.

"Alright Mei, stop that. Why don't we go to the park for a little while before checking into our hotel room?" Bianca says, taking her vanilla cone. Mei pouts, nodding as they all go to the big park in Unova, a very beautiful green outcropping in the middle of the city with wild pokemon roaming free, a reminder to co-exist with nature. They sit down at a bench next to the big tree in the heart of the park, one of many surrounding it and all of them occupied. Touko sighs and quietly eats her Castelia cone, Bianca smiling at her, her cone already devoured by the time they got there. "So where are we staying girls? I'd rather not stay at the pokemon center again, and we should be able to afford a hotel now with the money we got battling on the routes around Nimbasa, not to mention we might be able to get Platina Styles to cover our hotel costs!" She says, admiring the giant tree bathed in the light of the setting sun.

"Hm.... I wanna check out that one." Touko says, pointing at a glamorous hotel right by the park as she takes another bite of her ice cream. She gulps and freezes up, groaning and rubbing her head. "Oh, there's also that one right by the harbor with the amazing view! Oh, and there's that one from that romantic movie that you liked from fifty years ago Mei!" She says, her eyes sparkling.

"I'd love all of those just as much of you, but you know just as well as I do that they're fair to expensive for simple trainers like us, even if Platina will cover part of the costs." Mei says nonchalantly as she finishes her cone with a sigh, met with a pouting Touko.

"Yeah... But I can dream, I don't crush your hopes when you talk about being super cute and popular and stuff. H-Hey!" She cries as Mei takes the last bite of her ice cream cone, glaring at her as she smiles triumphantly. "I dare you to pull something like that again, I'll pull you over my knee and spank you." She says, grinning as Mei gulps and huffs, turning away.

"Oh my, I'd like to see that." Bianca says, patting Mei's bottom. "Well, I think I know what we should do before we go check into a hotel." She says, her face full of enthusiasm. "Though, you two will need to be wearing something more.. adult." She says, humming as she grabs their hands to pull them off to the pokemon center.

"W-What about the contract and stuff!?" Mei cries, stopping as she pulls back, pouting.

"Well, they probably won't know if we just change for a few hours, right? I don't see any harm in it." Touko says, tugging on the other brunette's hand to get her moving. "Besides, we'll still be wearing their stuff if we're just borrowing Bianca's stuff, right?" Mei groans, nodding and letting them drag her along to get changed at the pokemon center.

"Hm... I'm still not sure if this will work for you.." Bianca mutters, sighing and looking Mei up and down on the street right outside of a Jazz club. The shortest girl is dressed in a slightly poofy black dress that's a little long on her, seeing as it was meant for Bianca, though it was tight around the chest, a transparent camisole letting people glimpse at her cleavage and one black bow in her hair, now in a side-tail, black heels on her feet. They were unable to get the collar with the pacifier strapped on off of her, so they just did their best to hide the pacifier for now in her dress. "You're also kind of overdressed... Oh well, we can just say that you're going to an event after this or something. I just wish we could have found something else to hide your di-" Mei covers her mouth before she can say the word, the two older girls giggling.

"I have to say though, these actually are kind of cute." Touko says, wearing a tighter onepiece mint green dress with her hair in a mint green bangle, wearing green heels. "If only it was a bit longer.." She mutters, sighing as she tugs on the back, only coming down to mid-thigh.

"I think it's perfect on you!" Bianca says, wearing a black onepiece dress like Touko's along with a small black beret and heels. She of course doesn't have to worry about hiding a thick diaper like the other two. She perks up as she hears music starting up inside, grabbing the other two girl's hands. "come on, it's starting!" She says, flashing her ID to the bouncer at front before pulling her friends inside. The bouncer almost reaches out to stop Mei, afraid she may not be 20, but upon getting a glimpse of her chest lets her in.

Inside there's an aroma of tobacco right by the entrance, Mei choking on it as they get in and get to a table, one with a decent view of the band on the stage,a female singer with long red hair in a small black dress, her various pokemon playing all of the instruments, very skillfully at that. The girls order a few drinks, Mei unknowingly getting the one with the highest alcoholic content, and enjoy the music, Bianca getting in a conversation with a woman nearby. As the band takes a short break Touko turns her attention to her drink, taking a drink and looking at Mei curiously, noticing the girl blushing lightly and looking around sheepishly. "What's the matter Mei? You can't be drunk already! Maybe you used your diapy?" She teases, Mei blushing dark red and shaking her head, shushing her.

"Y-You haven't noticed!? Someone's been looking at us all night! Probably at me!" She says, crinkling her nose as she sniffs her drink, taking another sip.

"Oh you're just being your paranoid self-absorbed self silly, it's fine, nobody's gonna look at a little girl like you who can't even handle a drink like that!" She says, grinning and taking her drink from her, taking a big gulp, trying to maintain her composure as she sets it back down, the drink burning her throat, she could already feel a buzz after that and her first drink, which she already downed. "S-See, nothing to it. Maybe we should see if they have some sitrus berry juice for you?"

"Sh-Shut up, I handle my drink better than you!" Mei says, pouting, even though this was only her second time drinking the first time Touko got drunk within a few drinks. Upon Touko's prodding she downs the rest of her drink, Touko watching in amazement and shutting up as she sets down the empty glass, sighing. "Who's the little girl now bitch?" She says, grinning at her flustered friend.

"Oh don't tease her Mei, she doesn't have big boobies to suck up all the alcohol after all." Bianca says, turning around to face them again and taking a big gulp of her third beer as the music starts back up, sighing.

"I don't think that's really how it works Bianca." Mei mutters, looking at a waitress curiously as she looks around with a very expensive looking bottle of whiskey on her tray. "Huh, wonder what fucking big shot ordered that." She says, astonished as she sets down four shot glasses on their table and pours the whiskey into them. "H-Hold on, none of us ordered this!"
1241111111.title: Onwards!

12411111111.content:
"Oh, I know. It's from that woman in the VIP section." She says, pointing to the very nice booths in the front of the club. Mei feels shivers as she sees the woman approaching them, her thin slanted eyes focused on her, not her chest for once but her face. She's standing as tall as Bianca with a moderately sized bust, wearing a long red dress designed after a cheongsam with a long slit to show off one of her long creamy legs right up to her thigh and red heels, her hair jet black and looped into two gold hair clips, diamond and pearl rings on her left hand.

"Oh no, we've made a mistake, she must be part of a foreign crime syndicate like team flare and gave us an expensive drink before she takes us to a back alley or something!" Bianca panics, picking up the shot and throwing it back, sighing as it goes down. "Fuck that was actually really good."

"Please, she's clearly interested in me." Mei says, grinning confidently before looking at her shot glass nervously.

"She might have noticed we're trainers and has a request for us, am I right? What's your name?" Touko asks, the woman grinning as she takes a free seat on the other side of Mei

"You girls can just call me Ojou-sama for now. Hime-sama if you prefer." She says crossing her legs, her pink lips curled into a small smile. "I think you girls are fair more interesting than any of those other stuffy stuck-up aristocrats up there. Especially you, may I know your name miss?" She asks, directing her devilish smile at Mei, the girls heart beating faster.

"I'm Mei, the insanely cute trainer who will start in idol craze in a few years!" She says, her smile faltering as Touko and Ojou-sama chuckle. Sure she gets a little nervous saying embarrassing things like that, but she never felt this nervous in front of Touko and Bianca before. "A-And that's Touko and the giant one's Bianca!" She says.

"It's a pleasure to meet you all, I hope you like the whiskey. It's one my father quite liked so I thought I'd try it, but it seems it may be a little to strong for you two." The raven haired woman says, grinning before she downs her shot, quickly followed by Mei. "My my, only one left." She says, looking at Touko who shakes her head, pushing her shot over to Bianca.

"Thanks but I know my limits, I'd rather not have a hangover tomorrow." She says, Bianca downing the shot without hesitation, a giant grin on her face. "Waitress, a glass of water and a pint of Snowpoint for the lady here please!" Touko says, the woman looking at her curiously. "Oh, I thought I should treat you in return, I figured since you're a rich girl you may have never had a non-craft beer." She says, grinning.

"Touko don't be rude to her!" Mei whines, gulping as the woman starts giggling, thanking the waitress as she gives her the pint, picking it up and taking a big gulp, the girls watching in surprise.

"Oh it's fine, you don't know how tiring it gets being around people that are always overly proper to you all day! And to the contrary, this is the drink of my hometown!" She says, a Sinnoh accent to her voice now. "You girls really are interesting." She pauses as she chugs down another gulp of beer, sighing in satisfaction. "Not to mention this table doesn't smell like smoke and perfume, no I think it smells more like something sweet. Hmm, ah, that's it, it's baby powder!" The girls all freeze, the woman staring right at Mei knowingly as Bianca gives a nervous laugh.

"H-How'd you know we're wearing diapers!?" Mei blurts out in her slightly inebriated state, Touko quickly shooting her a glare.

"We? You're the o..only one in a diaper you weirdo, you're the one that wets herself sober." She says, Mei turning crimson and looking like she's on the verge of tears as she raises her dress."

"Oh my, how adorable! But lying's bad you know." The lady says as she slaps Touko's rear, the girl not letting go until Bianca slaps her hand. Before they can say anything else her pokegear starts ringing and she groans, checking it. She groans louder as she reads the message on it and quickly chugs down the rest of her beer, pouting as she sets it down. "Sorry girls, I'd love to stay longer but I have to leave on some business. I'll see you all again though." She says, blowing Mei a kiss as she gets her purse and leaves in a hurry.

"She was quite an interesting character." Bianca says, smiling and blushing dark red. "She was flirting with my cute little sister though! You're not allowed to be cwose to her again Mei!" She says, hugging Mei and kissing her cheek.

"H-Hey you don't get to decide who I associate with! A-And we'we not ev...even related!" Mei mumbles, her buzz clear as she groans and tries to pry Bianca off. As the two are pre-occupied Touko notices Mei's backpack hanging from her chair, her pokegear lighting on and off in it. While they're distracted she pulls it out, raising an eyebrow at the message she received.

"Mei, you know that hotel from that romance you liked? Well Platina Styles has booked a room there for you free of charge.And... just you, it seems." She says, checking her pokegear in disbelief. Mei gasps, grabbing her pokegear from her, gasping like a teenage girl as she reads the text on screen.

"O-Oh my god! Check in time's within the hour, I've got to get going!" She says, quickly gathering her things, Bianca still clinging to her. "I'll meet up with you girls at the pokemon center tomorrow and take tons of pictures for you!" The brunette cries, prying Bianca off from her as she heads towards the door. "Take good care of Bianca tonight Touko!" She cries before leaving, Touko waving and holding Bianca back from chasing her.

"B-But who will change her diapers if we're not there!?" Bianca cries, stumbling over her chair as Touko lets her go.

"Forget that, she forgot to pay for her drink! God damn it Mei!"

"Welcome to the Berlitz towers, you must be miss Mei." A woman in front of the giant hotel with two giant golden turtwig statues in front of it greets Mei with a bow as she stumbles up, after taking some pictures of course. "Right this way, I have special instructions on how to take you to your room." She says, leading her to the lobby, full of marble and gemstone encrusted light fixtures and gold trim.

"Special instructions? Platina Styles must finally be realizing how awesome I am." She says, grinning and waving to the aristocrats as the maid leads her to the side for some reason. "So what's so special?" She says, the smile fading from her face as she sees the pink adult-sized baby stroller she's being lead to. Before she has the chance to talk her pacifier is grabbed and put into her mouth and the maid easily overpowers her, forcing her into the stroller and strapping her in tightly.

"Miss Berlitz said that if you spit out that pacifier you will regret it." She says, Mei reluctantly sucking on the pacifier and blushing crimson as she rolls the stroller right back through the lobby, all of the aristocrats looking at her either in disbelief or chuckling. She looks down and tries to ignore everything until they're in the elevator, looking up to see the maid press the penthouse button.

"P-Penthouse!? W-Wait... Miss Berlitz...? L-Like the CEO of Platina Styles!?" The trainer cries in disbelief, the maid merely smiling and not giving her the satisfaction of an answer. She slips on a blindfold over the brunette's eyes before they arrive at the penthouse, rolling her for quite aways and opening a door before she stops her stroller in the middle of a room. She then slips some padded, fingerless mittens over her hands and locks them, makes sure she's strapped tight in the stroller, then finally Mei hears is the door closing. She only struggles with getting out of the stroller for ten minutes, unable to get out at all. She ends up sitting there for another thirty minutes, now holding herself because she had so much to drink before she eventually soaks her diaper, sobbing softly as she hears the door open.

"Oh what perfect timing! There there Mei, don't cry you cutie, I'm going to make it all better." The voice of the woman from the bar says, Mei's stroller harness coming undone.
12411111111.title: Continue (Character limit creeping up)

1242.content: Why is the young champion diapered? (assume she's 18 now)
1242.title: Iris

12422.content:
"I thought you were here to test me, not lose and cry like a child.." Elesa groaned, standing at the base of her catwalk and beginning her strut towards Iris. Iris was sitting on the ground sobbing, holding herself as she felt the need to pee. She yelped as Elesa got down, grabbing the champion and raising her skirt in front of everyone. "If you've been defeated like a new trainer, then I'll punish you like one!" She grabbed a paddle from one of her assisstants, bringing it down on iris' bottom. By 5 smacks her bottom was bright red, and at 6 there was a puddle forming around her knees.
"Look at this, you're worse than a new trainer! Looks like the little naughty champion is going to get elesa's special treatment!" The electric gym leader scolded, picking up the pace and intensity of her spanking.After a minute she let up, setting the bawling gym leader on her lap and exchanging her paddle with a bell collar, fastening it around her neck. "Now, let's get you diapered.."
12422.title: story 2

124221.content:
Elesa snapped her fingers as two assistants got her what she needed. a diaper, some powder, and a vibator. She first put the powder on Iris, the shoved the sex toy in Iris's womanhood making, her gasp, cray, the moan. She the forced Iris the stop moving so she could diaper her. After putting all the tapes on, the gym leader admired her work. While Iris covered her face with her hands not wanting to be seen right now. The forth gym leader quickly got a leash and attached it to Iris's collar, and giving it a tug.

"Come on now Iris we are..
124221.title: Right here

choices: "Through the city, especially the amusement park"
1242212.content:
Iris looked up at Elesa, trying to comprehend what had just happened. She moaned and drooled in her forced ecstasy, holding her hands over her now padded crotch in an attempt to stop the vibrator going rampant inside.
"Y-you're getting fired from the league for doing this to me!" Iris managed to cry out after a loud moan. Elesa snickered, while her audience burst out laughing. The model strutted closer to Iris, running her finger up the champion's chin and wiping way some of her tears.
"Silly girl, you have clearly never heard what happened to Skyla when she tried to test me, much like you.."A sadistic grin appeared on Elesa's face as she gave a hard tug on the leash, making Iris fall forward, coughing with her padded rear in the air. The crow applauded as she strolled to her backside, running the leash between her legs and pulling the leash taut to push against the vibrator. This sent Iris into a louder drooling and moaning fit as the girl gripped her skirt, doing whatever she could to control herself. She began to forget her status as a champion, or even as a pokemon trainer, becoming overwhelmed by the shame of how she was being treated in front of all of these people.
"St-stop, please, I'll do whatever you want!" Iris pleaded with her superior, wincing as she felt the leash loosen up. She curled up into a ball as she awaited some kind of blow, closing her eyes and bracing her every non-stimulated muscle. 1253212211.content:
All across Runeterra the League of Legends was becoming a popular spectator sport, despite it's original intentions. However, the events were far to violent for any child save those as demented as Annie.
Thus the summoners attempted to cast a regression spell on the entirety of Summoners rift and the champions. It failed however, and the champions were instead forced into child-like and child-friendly outfits whenever young summoners were present, where their power would be toned down and the sport would be unrecognizable.

We begin our story in the beginning of this practice with-
1253212211.title: The child friendly league!

12532122111.content:
"Welcome to Summoner's Rift!" The motherly voice echoed through the air as the first member of Blue team appeared on the fountain. Annie groaned as she appeared, her hands bound behind her back and her feet bound together until her teammates were summoned. Tired of being treated like the child she was Annie developed a spell to accelerate her aging and now stood as an eighteen year old instead of an eight year old. Unfortunately Annie wasn't allowed to graduate from her old clothes yet according to the summoners, which could be quite embarassing. Annie was wearing her recognizable purple dress today, but something was just off.

"W-why am I wearing this!?" Annie cried out, only now noticing the very thick diaper around her waist. It was generically white but very large, visible under the bottom of her already tight and short dress even when she tugged on it. In addition a pacifier was strapped to her large chest, her headband had a small added frilly bonnet, purple mittens adorned her hands, and a purple collar was fastened around her neck with a semi-transparent leash attached, leading off and vanishing. Now that Annie took a better look the fountain was different to. The ground was carpeted blue, the store was replaced with a large toybox, and she was kept in by what seemed to be a playpen.

A summoner shut Annie up and made her sit down on her thickly padded bottom. She stayed quiet as the other champions were summoned, all reacting similarly to Annie. Nidalee, in her french maid outfit due to the summoner's interesting taste with a diaper of her own obvious under the skirt. She also had on black kitty ears and a tail, black mittens chained close to her collar to force her into a cat paw pose, no spear, and her leash forced her onto all fours, exposing her bottom for the world to see. She looked ticked, gritting her teeth, trying futiley to get up. Her collar was black with a black pacifier hanging off of it.

Next was Lulu, under the effects of her own spell to appear with a body similar to Sejuani's. She still wore her usual winter dress though, tight now due to her increased size with a powder blue diaper peaking out. Her usual staff was replaced with a rattle, and her light lavender mittened hands were cuffed together. She had the priviledge of standing up, unlike Annie and Nidalee, and she didn't seem ticked like the others, just slightly red in the cheeks and curious. Her collar was baby blue with a blue pacifier hanging off of it. Pix was her usual poro self, nothing special.

A bubbly pop song began to play somewhere in the distance as the next champion was summoned. Annie's eyes lit up as Ahri was summoned onto the fountain, and quickly averted her gaze as she realized that the pop star was in the same position as the rest of them. Ahri groaned as she was dropped on the fountain, wearing an outfit reminiscent of what she wore during concerts, although it looked more intended for a child. The same short shorts were present, but her belt was gone and a thick pink diaper puffed out under her short shorts, the waistband going above the pants and bits of diaper sticking out of the leg holes. Her top was replaced with a white t-shirt that said 'charmed' on it and had a heart, small and revealing her midriff with frills on the short sleeves. Her hat stayed the same, although the bow on it was larger, and her heels were replaced with black dress shoes, frilly mary janes underneath. Her collar was pink, with a white pacifier hanging off of it. As soon as Ahri realized how she was dressed she let out a soft cry and tried to cross her arms across her chest, blushing lightly as she looked down. She got a toy plastic microphone with angel wings on it, and a pink ball replaced her normal orb.

Finally was Soraka, summoned on all fours. Instead of her usual robe-like garb Soraka had been subjected to a onesie version of it, soft and tight, securely hugging her body, especially the thick diaper underneath. She looked down, her face dark red, avoiding the gaze of the others. Her staff was also replaced with a rattle, one adorned with stars, and a white ponytail came off of the bottom of her onesie. Thick yellow mittens adorned her hands, and her collar was baby yellow with a matching pacifier hanging off of it.

"Well, look forward to working with you, I guess." I muttered nervously, reaching out my empty hand. She nodded and shook my hand gentle, following me down to bot. Well, at least she played some relaxing tunes on that string instrument of hers as we went to blue for that leash. We stood there for a second before I seemed to notice a rustling in the river bush. Relying on my summoner to signal to the other summoners what was going on, I decided to go investigate. As I walked into river alone a small tornado rushed out of the bush, which I barely managed to dodge before running back to my team.

"Hehe, sorry, I got a ward placed though, at least. And it looks like they won't invade." Neither Sona nor Sejuani looked to happy with me, and I yelped as Sona gave me a surprisingly hard slap to the bottom. "I get it I get it, I won't wander off without the team!" As we leashed I stayed behind a little slowly to test the range of the harness, and surely enough as soon as I was out of Sona's powerchord range the ropes would tighten and she'd give a hard tug, knocking me onto my bottom or all fours and dragging me along if I didn't get up and follow. As we got back to lane we were a little behind in minion kills, but Ashe (on the enemy team) spent enough time chuckling to allow us to catch up. I say us because I was having a tough time getting farm, what with being on the harness, but Sona had no problem picking up the CS I couldn't get. I hope my summoner straightens out hers to, this is just wrong, and humiliating as hell.

Once we hit level three me and Sona attacked Ashe and Janna with everything we had, though due to the harness we did less damage and had to pull back to our side of the lane, my bare thighs covered in frost and making me shiver.

I tried to escape as she spanked me ten more times but the strings on her instrument had warped, holding my arms in place until my bottom was as red as my face. "I-I'm sorry, the next fight will go better!" That answer seemed to appease her, as she let me go back to farming.
