(Note: Certain things in this story about Sombra are mostly likely non-canon to the character's lore. This is an attempt to make her a more compelling individual. Also, there will probably be an original character or two that has some sort of non-canonical connection to Sombra, since this IS a fanfiction interactive story, after all. Anyway, Enjoy the story!)

Survival.

In definition, it means to self-preserve and prolong one's life. And what such a simple word meant to the highly-skilled yet enigmatic female hacker known only as "Sombra", it was overall essential and paramount, both to her...and her personal singular crusade to tack down and expose the conspiracy that has ties to some major power players in the post-Omnic Crisis world she lives in, whether it was the terrorist organization known as Talon, or powerful corporations like the energy company LumériCo.

Suffice to say, Sombra was willing to manipulate individuals and organizations as a means to an end, including her "employers" at Talon, and her reluctant "comrades" Reaper and Widowmaker.

But today, however... Things were currently...less than smooth at the moment.

Most recently, Sombra was hauled into a hospital within her home city of Dorado, Mexico, her unconscious body laid out on a medical gurney. However, judging from her wounds, it appeared that she was injured by some sort of close-range firearm, like a shotgun. But while she was wheeled into the Intensive Care Wing for surgery, Sombra's unconscious mind began to reminisce on what she personally considered "The Good Old Days".

The first of such memories appeared in the form of a youthful Hispanic girl giving a gift basket to one Comisionado Rivera in the Dorado Police Department, while she subtly hacked into Rivera's computer database. It was from that day that she first learned a very important lesson that would ultimately defined her: "In a dangerous world, Knowledge and Information were powerful allies."

Eventually, this unique talent of hers quickly garnered her a lot of attention, which segued into the next memory: Her information racketeering and dealings with the self-styled Los Muertos Gang, aiding in their revolution against the government. However, this then led into her third memory: Receiving her cybernetic implants after being compromised by the conspirators she referred to as "The Eye", while she was being operated on by a Black Market Cybernetics Surgeon.

But in that progressive transformation, gone was the young girl orphaned by the First Omnic Crisis. And in her place...was Sombra.

Despite reminiscing on these nostalgic moments, Sombra eventually regained consciousness, where she slowly rose from the hospital bed she was currently laying on, placing a left hand upon the side of her head due to experiencing a slight migraine, speaking to herself as she groaned, *groan* Hijo de puta (Son of a bitch)! How did I get so reckless?" In an effort to regain her calm composure, Sombra slowly rubbed the bridge of her nose with her left hand, speaking to herself once more as she said, " *frustrated sigh* Calma abajo, Sombra (Calm yourself down, Sombra). Those Talon idiotas (idiots) were just a means to an end. Nada más y nada menos (Nothing more, nothing less)."

Shortly after calming herself down, Sombra eventually became aware that she was now within the clean sterile confines of a hospital room. Then, she looked down and noticed that she was no longer wearing her trademark outfit, as it was now laid out on a nearby chair, now wearing a hospital gown. However, once she was about to stand up from the hospital bed, Sombra suddenly heard this loud crinkling noise emanating from below her waistline.

From there, out of a slight sense of paranoia, Sombra lifted up the skirt of her hospital gown with both hands, which only revealed a shocking revelation: She was now wearing a thick adult-sized diaper! "¡¿Que demonios?! ¿Por qué estoy usando esto? (What the hell?! Why am I wearing this?!)" Sombra exclaimed, taken completely by surprise from seeing herself wearing the padded undergarment. After all, during her early years as a hacker, Sombra had encountered some..."unique" and awkward certainties in the digital web that was the Internet, and one of these "certainties" was none other than a handful of websites that supported ABs (Adult Babies) and DLs (Diaper Lovers).

Needless to say, that accidental discovery was one of Sombra's more awkward moments in her career of hacking.

However, just as she thought that things couldn't get any more awkward, Sombra...

Unfortunately for her though, it was easier said than done for Sombra, especially since she was now wearing an adequately thick diaper around her pelvis and crotch, which somewhat forced apart her legs slightly due to it's somewhat noticeable bulk and padding. In turn, this left Sombra in an awkward position, as she had to adjust her leg stance to accommodate for the diaper's bulky padding.

However, Sombra's forced effort was all for naught, as she then heard the voice of whoever entered the room. "Oh, you're awake! Thank goodness!" The voice said, indicating that Sombra's visitor was actually female. And yet, Sombra couldn't help but feel like the woman's voice sounded...familiar, as if she knew this individual before. So, in order to figure out who she was confronting, Sombra slowly turned herself around to face whoever was in the hospital room with her, which came in the form of a young Hispanic woman holding a tray of hospital food meant for Sombra.

Judging from her appearance, Sombra could easily tell that the woman appeared to be in her late 20s, complete with a firm but somewhat curvy frame, which was hidden underneath a pair of somewhat baggy light blue hospital scrubs, indicating that she most definitely works here at the hospital Sombra has found herself in. "...Where am I?" Sombra asked, where the woman then laid the tray of food down upon the table alongside Sombra's Machine Pistol and Translocator Beacon, as the woman then spoke toward the diapered Sombra and answered, "Oh that's easy, Senóra: You're in El Ala de Cuidados intensivos (the Intensive Care Wing) of the Abigail Cortez Hospital For The Injured."

From there, shortly after explaining to Sombra her current location, she then sat down in a nearby chair while Sombra hesitantly grabbed a small loaf of bread and took a few bites out of the bread, her magenta eyes still focused on the woman before her, just as she heard her guest speak to her and said, "...Though, to be honest, I never thought I'd see you again, Francesca."

Francesca. Now that...was a name that Sombra hasn't heard in a long time. After all...Francesca was actually her true. Before she had reinvented herself as the enigmatic hacker known as Sombra. So, in response to such an accusation from the woman, Sombra spoke toward her and answered, "No sé de qué estás hablando, chica (...I don't know what you're talking about, girl)."

"¡Disparates! (Nonsense!) No one forgets their name. ...Espera un minuto (...Wait a minute), you don't know who I am, don't you?" She replied, realizing that Sombra had no clue on who she really was. So, in response to this conundrum, the woman then calmly spoke toward Sombra and explained, "...Entiendo (...I understand). After all, its been over 20 years since we last saw each other, Francesca. My name is Maya Honduras. We used to live together in St. Michael's Home For Orphans shortly after LA Medianoche (The Midnight), when the Omnic Crisis killed our parents. Surely, you remember who I am, Francesca Alvarez?"

Although at first, Sombra tried her best to ignore Maya's words, knowing that the girl known as Francesca Alvarez was no longer the same youthful child from Dorado long ago, that she had drastically changed over the course of more than 20 years. And yet...there were still tiny glimpses within Sombra that foreshadowed that Francesca Alvarez was still deep inside her subconscious somewhere. So eventually, Sombra reluctantly decided to acknowledge that she was indeed Francesca Alvarez, especially since she now realized that she knew who Maya Honduras was: An old friend.

"...Maya?" Sombra asked, now coming to terms with such a revelation as this, causing Maya to swiftly wrap her arms around Sombra in a loving embrace, relieved to see that her friend still remembered her, squealing with delight as she said, "Oh Francesca! I knew that you would still remember me!" From there, Sombra carefully peeled Maya off of her, then spoke toward her and asked, "Fácil, Maya (Easy there, Maya). As much as I am glad to see you again, but...I have to ask..." From there, before she continued speaking, Sombra began to blush somewhat due to her padded predicament, then said, "...Why am I, um...wearing a diaper?"

The mess was being mushed up now and her bottom felt like it was getting a medium strength slap every time she was bounced up, her pacifier tumbling out of her mouth during her cries.
For the next fifteen minutes Weiss had to endure getting passed among the three girls whenever one of them needed a break and bounced on their knees. They finally stopped the torment once the white haired girl was on the brink of orgasm from the warm wet padding rubbing against her vagina so much, and messed herself for a second time. "Come on, let's get you changed." Ruby said, groaning as she stood up with the oversized newborn in her arms.
144121111.title: Diapering with a little extra

choices: They take her to the cafeteria for dinner
1441211111.content:
One of the girls had manage to steal a changing table from a nearby daycare at some point of the day and, as if to mock Weiss, they had placed it in the bathroom across from the toilet. This sight served as a cruel reminder to Weiss of what her new situation was as she was brought into the room she had wanted to go to earlier by a cheerfully humming Ruby bouncing the older girl in her arms. She was laid on the changing table and her cuffs were removed but not her mittens, Ruby wanting to continue to instill a feeling of helplessness in her teammate but knowing she wouldn't try anything without the cuffs now. She was peeling off the tapes and about to unfold the diaper when she noticed that Weiss was covering her face again. She sighed and shook her head, moving away her hands and giving her a slap on the thigh.
"Bad girl. No covering your face or your chest without permission." Ruby said sternly, humming once again as she took the dirty diaper and peeled it away from Weiss, balling it up and throwing it away. "What a naughty naughty naughty baby." She continued to tease as she began to clean her.
"W-Why don't you tell me something l-hi!" Weiss let out a gasp as she felt Ruby begin to clean her womanhood, arching her back and squirming until she was done, laying there panting and helpless.
"Well, you don't tell a baby rules, they won't understand. Be happy mommy was nice enough to tell you this time." The black haired girl said in a condescending tone as she got a new diaper with similar design but thicker and secured it tightly on Weiss. She began to sit up but quickly laid back down as Ruby gently slapped her thigh again. "Babies night night time is coming up, and we can't risk having her leak, now can we?" Ruby said as she got a second diaper, putting it over the first, Weiss' bottom now comedic-ally poofy.
"Bedtime? Ruby it's 6 PM!" Weiss protested, sniffling as her 'mommy' picked her up in shaky arms.
"Do you really think you're in any position to argue princess?" Blake said as Ruby came out of the bathroom with her baby, now smelling of baby powder. Weiss whimpered, burying her face in Ruby's shoulder, followed by a slap on the rear and a yelp.
"Since you are such a naughty girl, especially today, you'll be going to bed directly after dinner." Yang said with a mischievous grin as she took Weiss, making her whimper as she bounced her in her arms, considerably quicker than Ruby. "Unless of course, you want to receive another punishment in advance in exchange for staying up late." Weiss quickly shook her head no, earning a chuckle from Yang.
"I d-don't get it though... no matter how I look at it Ruby wasn't acting like an adult either.." Weiss mutters quietly as she's sat on Ruby's bed, making her 'mommy' turn a little pink as Blake grinned.
"Well, you're not wrong, but we've already handled her." She says, turning Ruby around and raising her combat skirt, revealing her pink bottom and potty training pull-up. "But unlike you she's a good girl that learns from her mistakes and wasn't spoiled."
"C-Come on, I don't want Weiss to see something like that!" Ruby whined, pouting as she tugged her skirt back down, her face as pink as her rear. "Let's hurry up and dress her super cute!" She says, suddenly shifting to excitement, rushing to Weiss' drawer.
"Dress me!? I mean, I don't want to st-stay like this, but I can dress myself!" Weiss protests, standing up only to get pushed back down with a noisy crinkling from her rear and a pacifier back in her mouth.
"Nu-uh, babies can't dress themselves!" Yang says, giving Weiss three slaps to her heavily padded rear, making the blows considerably more gentle to Weiss' relief. She didn't protest the rest of the time as the girls got her into her new clothes. They stood her up in front of her mirror and she dreaded what she saw. She was wearing a white pair of footie pj's with a snowflake pattern and a rear flap, her thickly padded bottom still pretty obvious to anyone who spent more than ten seconds looking at her. As if it weren't already infantile enough though, there was a strap attached to her chest that was connected to the ring of her pacifier, making sure she wouldn't drop and lose it.
"Wow, she really is adorable like this.. I wish she really was my baby sister." Blake said as she added the finishing touches, fastening a white collar around the baby's neck. "Don't panic, that's just a little something to make sure you listen to us. Now then."
1441211111.title: She receives a normal change

14412111111.content:
"Fine, go get my dinner then, I'll wait her." Weiss said, wincing as she sat down on the bed, her bottom still very sore despite all that padding. She raised an eyebrow as Yang and Ruby chuckled, gulping as Blake grabbed her right mittened hand and Ruby her left.
"Nope, you need to come to the cafeteria to eat like the rest of us! One thing you'll be learning is how to be humble." Ruby said, Weiss struggling as she was dragged out of the door by her teammates, shaking her head no.
"And don't think we won't hesitate to spank you in front of everyone if you do something we don't like!" Yang said much louder than Weiss would like, the princess suddenly cooperatively trudging along behind Ruby and Blake, sniffling as she dropped the pacifier out of her mouth.
It was only a few minutes walk from their dorm room to the cafeteria, but for Weiss it felt like an eternity. Her diapers were designed for cuteness and thickness not to be discrete, so on top of her humiliating get-up there was a soft crinkling noise from the plastic backing every time she took a step. She felt everyone's eyes on her whenever she passed them, and one of her caretakers was constantly putting her pacifier back into her mouth each time she spit it out. And it was obvious to the big baby that her teammates were enjoying this a lot, but they were at least courteous enough to tell anyone that was inquiring to leave their white haired princess alone. Though for a few people they let them grab a hold of her to take a picture, such as Velvet. They were able to get to the cafeteria without incident or a crying baby though, where they split up, Ruby taking Weiss to their table while Blake and Yang got food for all four of them.
"Oh my god Weiss, that's so cute!" Nora cried from across the table, all of team JNPR already sat there. Jaune (Female) and Pyrrha were in their normal school outfits, but the eccentric Nora was in a pink koala kigurumi, and she somehow coaxed Rin (Female Ren) into a blue one. "When did you get a taste for such cute clothes?" She asked, earning a glare from the ice princess.
"Oh, she loves dressing like this, but she was always to shy to admit it. That's why after losing a bet we're making her.. come out of her shell a little!" Ruby said cheerfully as Weiss sat down with a crinkle. Before Weiss' bottom hit the chair that Ruby sweeped Weiss up and sat her padded bottom on her lap, hugging her happily.
"R-Ruby!" Weiss cried out, clearly complaining.
14412111111.title: They take her to the cafeteria for dinner

choices: Weiss gets set down for bedtime.
144121111111.content:
"Weiss, no whining." Ruby says sternly, making her yelp as she gives her bottom a slap. "Now face mommy, and give her a nice hug." Ruby whispered into her ear, a big smile on her face as Weiss reluctantly but obediently turned to face Ruby and wrap her arms around her waist, her padded crotch now pressed against her leg. The princess whimpered and turned red as Ruby lowered her rear flap, feeling the hot gazes of the others at the table on her poofy bottom.
"Ruby! Put that back up!" Weiss cried, gasping as Ruby slapped her bottom, still immensely painful on her sore bottom despite her thick padding. "Please stop.. I'll cooperate.." Weiss whispered, sniffling. She whimpered as Ruby stuck her pacifier back in her mouth.
"If you're a good girl for the rest of your punishment, you'll only get five more." Ruby said, the pacifier falling out of Weiss' mouth as she cries out from the next spanking.
"Someone was a naughty girl again already?" Yang asked with a smile, sitting down with Blake with their food, all eyes on Weiss as she got her next spanking.
"I'm afraid we're a little lost, what's going on here?" Pyrrha asked, blushing dark red and watching with reluctant interest as Weiss got her next slap to her bottom. "Would anyone care to explain?"
"Our little princess here needed a little re-education, as I'm sure you noticed, so we're taking it into our own hands." Blake said, calmly eating her food as Weiss got two more spankings.
"And she has accidents alll the time. Plus, she loves this kind of treatment!" Ruby blatantly lies, tying a big bib around her neck before setting her on her lap like normal, before eating her own meal.
" Well, if she's okay with it, then." Pyrrha said a little meekly, the rest of JNPR nodding much to Weiss' dismay as she tried to pick up her silverware, her mittens keeping her from doing so.
" She's really cute! I want to play with her!" Nora cried, her mouth full of food.
"Ah, silly baby, you can't feed yourself! Wait until mommy's done with her meal sweetie." Ruby said softly, patting Weiss' head. While everyone else ate Weiss had to sit there awkwardly, whimpering and hiding her face behind her mittens whenever they got to talking about her and how cute she was between bites. "Okay Weiss, is there anything here that you don't like?" Ruby asked once she finally finished her meal. Weiss gulped as she saw what was on her plate, mushed up vegetables and fruit, about half of which she didn't have any fondness for. She didn't want to seem like more of a child though.
"O-Of course not, I'm not some picky little kid." She said dismissively, She gulped suddenly as she found a spoon full of mush in her mouth, reluctantly swallowing the foul tasting mix. Ruby continued to put the spoon in her mouth quickly, giving her no time to protest or whine as everyone else cooed over her and her firey red cheeks. Ruby also made sure to make it a little difficult for Weiss to get the spoon in her mouth properly, making sure she got food on her mouth and bib.
"What a messy eater." Pyrrha said, Ruby giggling as she got a wet wipe and wiped off Weiss' face then took off her bib.
"A-Are we done here!?" Weiss asked, her heart sinking as Yang shook her head no.
"You should thank me Weiss, I managed to get this for you earlier today." Yang said, grinning as she took a soft blue baby bottle out of the bag by her side, already filled with warm baby formula, heated up while they were getting food.
"Um, if it's alright, may I try feeding her?" The redhead across the table asked, grinning meekly at Weiss.
"Oh, sure! I'll be able to take pictures this way!" Ruby cried, grunting as she took her oversized baby off of her lap and set her aside. "Now crawl to Auntie Pyrrha, okay?" Weiss nodded meekly, beggining to waddle to the other side of the table, quickly getting a hard slap on the bottom from Blake.
"Babies crawl, Weiss." She said sternly. A tear rolled down Weiss' cheek as she hesitantly obeyed, getting down on all fours and crawling to Pyrrha on the other side of the table, who happily and easily picked her up and set her on her lap. Weiss shifted uncomfortably as Pyrrha took the bottle, supporting the back of her head as she slipped the rubber nipple into Weiss' mouth. Weiss whimpered as the warm sweet liquid went down her throat, closing her eyes so she didn't have to see Ruby taking pictures of her.
"Oooh you're such a good, cute widdle girl, yes you are!" Pyrrha cooed as Weiss drained the bottle, bouncing her on her lap lightly. Once she was done with her bottle Pyrrha reluctantly set her down on her bottom on the ground. "Alright, now crawl back to your mommy." She said, tears already brimming in Weiss' eyes. The white haired girl began to crawl back, in plain view of everyone. But one off-hand comment about her poofy bottom from some stranger in the dining hall made her freeze in place partway there, her tears hitting the ground.
"Th-that's it! I hate this I hate this I hate this!" Weiss cried loudly, beginning to bawl like a child and rub her eyes, her whining quickly becoming unintelligible babbling. Yang quickly got up, a worried look on her face as she effortlessly scooped Weiss up and bounced her in her arms, rubbing her back and trying to comfort her.
"There there Weiss, it's okay. You're just a baby, don't worry about all of this." Yang said, her words having the opposite effect on Weiss as she began to cry louder. "Crap. Sorry, it seems we have a grumpy baby here who needs to be set down for naptime." She said, team JNPR nodding in understanding as team RWBY rushed to return to their room.
